mapper.insert: insert into BASE_DICTIONARY (ID, DICT_ENTRY, SUB_ENTRY, DICT_PROMPT, ORDER_NUM, MEMO, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictEntry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subEntry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictPrompt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update BASE_DICTIONARY set DICT_ENTRY = #{dictEntry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUB_ENTRY = #{subEntry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DICT_PROMPT = #{dictPrompt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, DICT_ENTRY, SUB_ENTRY, DICT_PROMPT, ORDER_NUM, MEMO, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME from BASE_DICTIONARY where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
